title: Моя девочка
overview: The prosperous life of operative Leonov collapses after the death of his beloved wife. The criminals kill her in front of their 10-year-old daughter Masha. After her experience, the girl is plagued by panic attacks. She cannot let go of her father for a second - she is afraid that a tragedy will happen to him too. The policeman has no choice but to take his daughter with him to work.
